short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension to provide support when you feel upset while browsing (10 images max)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you are feeling sad, just open the extension and click anywhere for a helpful image to appear and make you feel better! Remember to pin it!
